sub-events.comment: Arrays are stored serially connected dots and lines .
Well, there is nothing complicated . Take the current line and the point . Destroying line and point reset flag IsConnected.
When you click on the first point set flag isConnected to True, indicates that begin " drag " line , memorizing the color, to create a line , remember UIDs point and the newly created line.

If you had your finger on the point and it does not soedenina and color coincides with the current , and it is not the current point , then create a new line ( to specify the width and angle of the current line ) , remember it ( and point) , set the flag isConnected to True, increase the number of connected points .

When finished , " drag " line , check the number of connected points . If there are more than 2 then destroy all connected points . Then destroy all the lines (to avoid bugs) , and reset the variables and cleanse arrays.
